sentences.en: Alain Prost finished third and virtually conceded the world championship.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·普罗斯特以第三名的成绩结束比赛，实际上已经将世界冠军的位置拱手让人。

sentences.en: Anita pushed her plate away; she had eaten virtually nothing.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔把自己的盘子推开；她几乎什么都没吃。

sentences.en: He knew virtually nothing about music but he could smell a hit.
sentences.cn: 他对音乐几乎一窍不通，却预感到它将会大受欢迎。

sentences.en: He was virtually unknown before running for office.
sentences.cn: 他在参加竞选之前几乎不为人知。

sentences.en: In less than two hours Cohen capitulated to virtually every demand.
sentences.cn: 还不到两个小时，科恩就屈服了，接受了几乎一切要求。

sentences.en: Its members had come out virtually unanimously against the tests.
sentences.cn: 会员们几乎一致表示反对这些测试。

sentences.en: Its vineyards are virtually contiguous with those of Ausone.
sentences.cn: 其葡萄园差不多紧挨着欧颂堡的葡萄园。

sentences.en: She virtually never mentions him in her corre-spondence or notebooks.
sentences.cn: 她在书信和笔记中几乎从不提及他。

sentences.en: The foggy streets were virtually empty, except for the occasional evening stroller.
sentences.cn: 除了偶尔一两个傍晚出来散步的人，雾蒙蒙的街上空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The old Dutch fort with its thick high walls looks virtually impregnable.
sentences.cn: 古老的荷兰城堡城墙又厚又高，看起来几乎固若金汤。

sentences.en: There were contingents from the navies of virtually all EU countries.
sentences.cn: 几乎欧盟各国都派出了海军分队。

sentences.en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentences.cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentences.en: Valentino was virtually deified by legions of female fans.
sentences.cn: 瓦伦蒂诺几乎被众多的女性崇拜者奉若神明。

sentences.en: Virtually all cooking was done over coal-fired ranges.
sentences.cn: 事实上所有的烹饪都是在烧煤的炉灶上完成的。

sentences.en: Virtually all the children come to school by bus.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有的孩子都乘公交车上学。

sentences.en: Virtually every woman in the '20s swooned over Valentino.
sentences.cn: 在20年代，几乎每位女性都痴迷于华伦天奴这个品牌。

sentences.en: When Sotomayor is on form he is virtually invincible.
sentences.cn: 索托马约尔状态好时几乎无人可敌。

sentences.en: You'll take everything you're offered yet your own generosity is virtually non-existent.
sentences.cn: 你倒是来者不拒，照单全收，可你自己实际上却一毛不拔。

words.tran_cn: [计] 虚拟的；有效的；实质上的，事实上的
几乎,差不多,实质上,接近,几乎不

trans.tran_cn: 实际上，实质上，事实上，几乎，无形中，无形
